Ji1 du1 jiao4 Ke1 xue2 pai4

definition: Corpus Christi (Catholic festival on second Thursday after Whit Sunday)
The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
pinyin: Ye1 su1 Ji1 du1 Hou4 qi1 Sheng4 tu2 Jiao4 hui4
containing_words.word: 耶稣基督后期圣徒教会

definition: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
pinyin: Ye1 su1 Ji1 du1 Mo4 shi4 Sheng4 tu2 Jiao4 hui4
containing_words.word: 耶稣基督末世圣徒教会

sentences.english: Pray for the government to halt its campaign of targeting Christians .
sentences.chinese: 祷告政府会停止以基督徒为箭靶的活动。

sentences.english: The two fish of Pisces show Christianity's split between spirit and matter.
sentences.chinese: 双鱼宫的两条鱼表明基督教的灵性与物质的分离。

sentences.english: Christian dedication and faithfulness in worshiping, studying the Word, receiving the sacrament.
sentences.chinese: 在做礼拜，学习圣经，领圣餐时基督徒的奉献和忠诚。

sentences.english: Had Jesus not died on the cross, Christianity would not have triumphed.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣要是不死在十字架上，基督教就无法取得胜利。

sentences.english: Christians believe Jesus Christ was buried where the Church of the Holy Sepulchre now stands in Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 基督徒们相信耶稣基督就是被葬在了这座圣墓教堂下。

sentences.english: Christians believe Jesus Christ was buried where the Church of the Holy Sepulchre now stands in Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 基督徒们相信耶稣基督就是被葬在了这座圣墓教堂下。

sentences.english: Wow he send weapons to the enemy who beheads Christians.
sentences.chinese: 哇他竟然给斩杀基督徒的敌人运送武器。

sentences.english: At the same time, Christians in waiting for an opportunity outside Granada.
sentences.chinese: 而与此同时，基督徒在格拉纳达以外等待时机。

sentences.english: Welcome to the Evangelical Formosan Church of Philadelphia resource link repository.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎来到费城台服基督教会网路资源链接库。

sentences.english: We ought not to need the exhortation: it should be our constant habit all the day and every day.
sentences.chinese: 这应该是基督徒每日的习惯，无需特别耳提面命。

sentences.english: Union with Christ means that when Christ died, I died with Him.
sentences.chinese: 与基督团结意味着当基督死去的时候，我与他同死。

sentences.english: Union with Christ means that when Christ died, I died with Him.
sentences.chinese: 与基督团结意味着当基督死去的时候，我与他同死。

sentences.english: The hugest one is Christ Resurrection Cathedral.
sentences.chinese: 其中最大的是基督复活教堂。

sentences.english: The score has also been published by the Chinese Christian Literture Council Ltd. , HK. , 2005. …
sentences.chinese: 乐谱亦已于2005年由香港基督教文艺出版社出版。

sentences.english: Professor: Why we think Rome was persecuting Christians?
sentences.chinese: 为什么我们会认为罗马在迫害基督徒？

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
